text: I've teamed up with @Sen_JoeManchin, @SenToddYoung, @SenatorSinema, @SenCapito, @SenDougJones, @SenAlexander, @SenAngusKing, @SenRobPortman, @MarkWarner, @SenDavidPerdue, @SenMcSallyAZ & others on the bipartisan #TRUSTact to rescue our federal trust funds: https://www.romney.senate.gov/romney-bipartisan-coalition-introduce-trust-act-inclusion-next-relief-package

Ignoring the state of our national debt is irresponsible and financially reckless. While the additional spending associated with #COVID19 relief was urgent and necessary, it has ramped up our national debt and expedited the insolvency of our federal trust funds. https://twitter.com/WSJ/status/1301225059990876160 QT @WSJ Breaking: U.S. government debt next year will exceed what the economy produces, a mark not seen since World War II, as the country spends trillions to combat Covid-19 https://trib.al/5bnpQJL

As we head into Labor Day weekend, it’s vital we remain vigilant to stop the spread of COVID-19. Avoid large crowds, mask up, and wash your hands. We can beat this virus, but we have to do it together.

Families across the country can’t afford to pay their bills and are struggling to put food on the table while trying to stay safe during this pandemic.

The American people need relief to get through this crisis. Congress must act.

Any attempts by my Senate colleagues to spread medically inaccurate information about reproductive health care are dangerous and irresponsible. https://www.huffpost.com/entry/female-senators-fda-medication-abortion-coronavirus_n_5e95c563c5b6cc788eaf939b?s3

Let's be clear: years of scientific evidence show that medication abortion is safe and effective. At a time when COVID-19 and the maternal mortality crisis are disproportionately harming people of color, we should be ensuring access to essential medical care – including abortion.

RT @RepPressley Today, @SenWarren, @RepBarbaraLee and I are introducing the Anti-Racism in Public Health Act of 2020.

This bill expands research and investment into the public health impacts of structural racism and requires the federal government to actively develop anti-racist health policy. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EhAj8HvX0AATvMM.jpg

RT @RepBarbaraLee Systemic racism can be found in nearly everything. Racial injustices in health care are a matter of life & death, & COVID-19 has only made matters worse.
 
I’m working w/ @SenWarren & @RepPressley to address these disparities in public health outcomes. It's unacceptable. https://twitter.com/TheRoot/status/1301531597737517057 QT @TheRoot Sen. Elizabeth Warren (@ewarren) and Reps. Ayanna Pressley (@RepPressley) and Barbara Lee (@RepBarbaraLee) announced a new plan that would declare racism a public health issue: https://www.theroot.com/exclusive-sen-elizabeth-warren-and-reps-ayanna-press-1844941000?utm_campaign=TheRoot&utm_content=1599144269&utm_medium=SocialMarketing&utm_source=twitter http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eg_4FtRX0AArrJg.jpg

RT @justiceinaging @justiceinaging is proud to support the Anti-Racism in Public Health Act to address the public health impacts of structural racism and develop an anti-racist health policy to improve the lives of older adults of color. https://www.warren.senate.gov/imo/media/doc/Anti-Racism in Public Health Act 1-pager FINAL.pdf https://twitter.com/SenWarren/status/1301533559744851969 QT @SenWarren The Anti-Racism in Public Health Act will:
✅Create an anti-racism center at CDC to confront the health impacts of structural racism and declare racism as the public health crisis that it is
✅Develop a program at CDC to make confronting police brutality a public health issue

RT @MassAGO Good morning!

We just filed an order to immediately block Louis DeJoy's illegal changes to the Postal Service. We won’t allow Donald Trump’s cronies to sabotage our elections.

RT @NPWF .👏👏👏👏We're proud to support this timely legislation. https://twitter.com/SenWarren/status/1301533559744851969 QT @SenWarren The Anti-Racism in Public Health Act will:
✅Create an anti-racism center at CDC to confront the health impacts of structural racism and declare racism as the public health crisis that it is
✅Develop a program at CDC to make confronting police brutality a public health issue

I'm thankful to have Senators @MazieHirono, @SenMarkey, @SenJeffMerkley, and @SenTinaSmith to help lead this fight to make our federal health system anti-racist, develop race-conscious public health approaches, and reverse disparities that have plagued our nation for too long.

The Anti-Racism in Public Health Act will:
✅Create an anti-racism center at CDC to confront the health impacts of structural racism and declare racism as the public health crisis that it is
✅Develop a program at CDC to make confronting police brutality a public health issue

COVID-19 has made it impossible to ignore how centuries of structural racism have created deep disparities in health outcomes for Black and Brown communities. @RepBarbaraLee, @RepPressley and I are introducing a new bill to fight these disparities head-on. https://www.theroot.com/exclusive-sen-elizabeth-warren-and-reps-ayanna-press-1844941000
